revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_M_CheckAttack}} '''A_M_CheckAttack'''
(no parameters)
If the calling actor has no target, or its special1 field is non-null, then it is put in its SkipAttack state. Otherwise, calls [[A_FaceTarget]]. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ScriptedMarine}} and derived classes. [[Category:Decorate Doom functions]] [[Category:Decorate Classic attack functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:M_CheckAttack}}
